item.title: COTY INC 10-K
item.description: COTY INC, which is in the Perfumes, Cosmetics & Other Toilet Preparations [2844] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 25, 2022 had 58180 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 746 instances 2022 - 535 instances 2021 - 505 instances stock - 465 instances fiscal - 457 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
